featuredArticles.title: Microservices Anti-Patterns: Common Mistakes and How to Avoid Them
featuredArticles.excerpt: An in-depth look at the most common microservices anti-patterns including distributed monolith, database coupling, chatty services, and improper service boundaries. Learn practical strategies to avoid these pitfalls in your architecture.

featuredArticles.title: Building Event-Driven Systems with Kafka and Spring Boot: Production-Ready Patterns
featuredArticles.excerpt: Complete guide to implementing production-ready event-driven architectures using Apache Kafka and Spring Boot. Covers event sourcing, CQRS, saga patterns, dead letter queues, and monitoring strategies for mission-critical systems.
